import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import GetProfileDataAxios from './GetProfileDataAxios'; import Form from "react-bootstrap/Form"; import InputGroup from "react-bootstrap/InputGroup"; import Row from "react-bootstrap/Row"; import Col from "react-bootstrap/Col"; import { Container } from "react-bootstrap"; import Button from "react-bootstrap/Button"; function ViewProfile() { const [profdata, setprofdata] = useState([]) useEffect(() => { GetProfileDataAxios.GetProfileDataAxios().then((value)=>{ setprofdata(value); }) },[]); const viewAddress = () => { console.log("test view Address") return(
ADDRESS DETAILS Flat Number House Number Street Name Colony Name City Pincode State
) } return ( <>

PROFILE DETAILS

 Full Name Email address @ We'll never share your email with anyone else. Contact Number About Age Gender Role {profdata.address!==undefined&&viewAddress()}
); } export default ViewProfile;
